about_the_game:
Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 3. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!
From modern apartments to huge shopping malls, you’ll discover many kinds of monopoly-friendly businesses and make them flourish in the city.

With this DLC you will unlock 36 new Buildings to unlock.

HIGHLIGHTS
– Buy new establishments and make them grow to earn more money!
– City builder and idle clicker hybrid
– Only one resource to be worried about – money
– Small, medium, and large buildings
– No internet required to play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
